Opening of 'Improving Language Model Rea.description: Introduction to the topic of improving reasoning capabilities in language models using reinforcement learning, highlighting the significance and objectives of the presentation.

subsections: State of Large Language Models and Post-Training
Introduction to Improving Reasoning thro.description: Overview of Large Language Models (LLMs), the impact of post-training phases, and how reinforcement learning is utilized to enhance reasoning abilities, along with the importance of distillation into smaller models.

Key Contributions in Reinforcement Learn.description: Detailed discussion on the main contributions such as applying large-scale reinforcement learning in post-training and leveraging the strengths of smaller models through distillation.

Evaluation Results Summary.description: Summary of evaluation results showing the performance of the improved models on specialized reasoning tasks and knowledge benchmarks, offering insights into their effectiveness.

Conclusion and Future Directions.description: Conclusive remarks on leveraging reinforcement learning for improving reasoning in language models, and potential future directions in model enhancement.
